1370: Bertoldus was born in Davids hof in 1370.
Got married to Woltwigis at age 21 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Woltwigis, Liedelde, at age 21.
1372: Had a son with Woltwigis, Meynolphus, at age 23.
1373: Had a son with Woltwigis, Dauid, at age 24.
1375: Had a son with Woltwigis, Wigboldo, at age 26.
1376: Had a son with Woltwigis, Wigboldo, at age 27.
Lost son Meynolphus when Meynolphus was 5 years old.
1378: Lost son Dauid when Dauid was 6 years old.
1384: Had a son with Woltwigis, Samuel, at age 35.
1385: Had a daughter with Woltwigis, Meynseth, at age 36.
1388: Had a daughter with Woltwigis, Flore, at age 39.
1393: Lost daughter Flore when Flore was 6 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
